scripts.watch: npm run clean:output && parcel watch src/mainBundles/*.js --dist-dir wwwroot/js
scripts.start: concurrently --raw --kill-others-on-fail "docker compose up" "npm run watch" || npm run docker:down"
scripts.build: npm run clean:output && parcel build src/mainBundles/*.js --dist-dir wwwroot/js --no-source-maps
